title: It's the foundation of psychiatric diagnosis. And it's about to get a makeover
desc: The current edition of the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual is known as the DSM-5. What will the next version be called? That's one of several open questions as the "Bible of psychiatry" goes online.

title: Biofilms May Have Sparked Life on Earth-and Could Sustain It in Space
desc: How can microorganism communities known as biofilms, and have been hypothesized to be responsible for early life on Earth, be used for space exploration? This is what a recent study published in npj Biofilms and Microbiomes hopes to address as an international collaboration of researchers investigated the pros and cons of using biofilms in spaceflight. This study has the potential for scientists to better understand the role of biofilms in spaceflight while mitigating health risks of astronauts.

title: Mchunu denies coercing Witness E to lie to Madlanga Commission
desc: Suspended Police Minister Senzo Mchunu has denied allegations made by witness E at the Madlanga Commission as inaccurate and untruthful.

title: Deduction of €783 per year to hit pay packets of large number of average wage workers from this week

title: Vatican Doctrinal Chief Warns Against Condemnations, Urges Humility in the Church
desc: Cardinal Víctor Manuel Fernández said Church officials with censorious attitudes risks promoting “the same deception that led to the excesses of the Inquisition.”

title: Pegula defeats Anisimova in all-American affair to reach first Australian Open semifinal
desc: On her fourth try, Jessica Pegula advanced to her first semifinal in Melbourne on Wednesday with a straight-sets victory over compatriot Amanda Anisimova, the third American she's beaten at the event. A meeting with Elena Rybakina awaits.

title: Sensitization to Recombinant A Fumigatus Linked to Bronchiectasis Severity
desc: Severe bronchiectasis exacerbations may be linked to rAsp f sensitization, mostly in those with fewer baseline exacerbations and Asian patients.
